Container.Name: OpenClaw
Container.Overview: OpenClaw is a personal AI assistant platform that provides a unified control plane for connecting multiple messaging channels (WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Google Chat, Signal, iMessage, Teams, Matrix, Zalo, and WebChat) to an AI agent. Run your own AI assistant locally on your UNRAID server.
Container.Description:
OpenClaw is a multi-channel AI assistant gateway that runs on your own infrastructure.

Features:
  • Connect multiple messaging platforms (WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, Discord, Google Chat, Signal, iMessage, Teams, Matrix, Zalo, WebChat)
  • AI-powered responses using Claude API or local models
  • WebSocket-based control plane and API
  • Voice wake-word detection and audio responses
  • Companion apps for macOS, iOS, and Android
  • Secure authentication and token-based access
Default Ports:
  • 18789: Main WebSocket Gateway (required)
  • 18790: Bridge port for device pairing (optional)
Setup Instructions:
  1. Install the container from this template
  2. Access the WebUI at http://[your-unraid-ip]:18789/
  3. Configure AI credentials in the environment (see Advanced settings)
  4. Set up your messaging channels (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, etc.)
  5. Connect your devices through the control plane
See complete installation guide for detailed setup.

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: OpenClaw configuration directory (includes openclaw.json and state)

Config.Name: Workspace Path
Config.Description: OpenClaw workspace directory for additional data

Config.Name: Claude AI Session Key
Config.Description: Claude API session key (if using Claude AI backend)

Config.Name: Claude Web Session Key
Config.Description: Claude Web session key for browser-based Claude access

Config.Name: Node Environment
Config.Description: Set the Node.js environment (production or development)
